excerpt: A quick and easy vegan omelette alternative using chickpea flour.

instructions.name: Mix dry ingredients
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the chickpea flour, nutritional yeast, baking powder, garlic powder, turmeric, salt and black pepper.

instructions.name: Mix wet ingredients
instructions: In a separate bowl, whisk together the water and olive oil.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, whisking until well combined and smooth.

instructions.name: Cook the omelette
instructions: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Once hot, pour half of the batter into the pan and swirl to coat the bottom of the pan.
Add your desired filling options onto one half of the omelette.
Gently fold the other half of the omelette over the filling and cook for another minute or until the filling is heated through.
Slide the omelette onto a plate and repeat with the remaining batter and filling.
